column5: This one-of-a-kind house is close to downtown Austin via a 12-minute rideshare, great restaurants in West Lake Hills area and easy access to gorgeous hiking spots and Hill Country destinations like Fredericksburg. Youâ€™ll love your stay here because of the bizarre architecture, great views, giant pool, huge jacuzzi, gorgeous trees, seclusion and incredible location near downtown Austin. It's perfect for couples, families (with kids), big groups, and furry friends (pets).
column8: Secluded Modern Home Near Downtown With Huge Pool
